verses.verse: A Song, a Psalm of David. My heart <S%H3820><s%> is fixed <S%H3559><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>; I will sing <S%H7891><s%>, yea <S%H2167><s%>, I will sing praises, even with my glory <S%H3519><s%>.
Awake <S%H5782><s%>, psaltery <S%H5035><s%> and harp <S%H3658><s%>: I myself will awake <S%H5782><s%> right early <S%H7837><s%>.
I will give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto thee <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, among the peoples <S%H5971><s%>; And I will sing praises <S%H2167><s%> unto thee among the nations <S%H3816><s%>.
For thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> above the heavens <S%H8064><s%>; And thy truth <S%H571><s%> reacheth unto the skies <S%H7834><s%>.
Be thou exalted <S%H7311><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, above the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, And thy glory <S%H3519><s%> above all the earth <S%H776><s%>.
That thy beloved <S%H3039><s%> may be delivered <S%H2502><s%>, Save <S%H3467><s%> with thy right hand <S%H3225><s%>, and answer us <S%H6030><s%>.

God <S%H430><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> in his holiness <S%H6944><s%>: I will exult <S%H5937><s%>; I will divide <S%H2505><s%> Shechem <S%H7927><s%>, and mete out <S%H4058><s%> the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Succoth <S%H5523><s%>.
Gilead <S%H1568><s%> is mine <S%H4519><s%>; Manasseh is mine <S%H669><s%>; Ephraim also is the defence <S%H4581><s%> of my head <S%H7218><s%>; Judah <S%H3063><s%> is my sceptre <S%H2710><s%>.
Moab <S%H4124><s%> is my washpot <S%H7366><s%>; Upon Edom <S%H123><s%> will I cast <S%H7993><s%> my shoe <S%H5275><s%>; Over Philistia <S%H6429><s%> will I shout <S%H7321><s%>.
Who will bring <S%H2986><s%> me into the fortified <S%H4013><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>? Who hath led <S%H5148><s%> me unto Edom <S%H123><s%>?
Hast not thou cast us off <S%H2186><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>? And thou goest not forth <S%H3318><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, with our hosts <S%H6635><s%>.
Give <S%H3051><s%> us help <S%H5833><s%> against the adversary <S%H6862><s%>; For vain <S%H7723><s%> is the help <S%H8668><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>.
Through God <S%H430><s%> we shall do <S%H6213><s%> valiantly <S%H2428><s%>: For he it is that will tread down <S%H947><s%> our adversaries <S%H6862><s%>.
